page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content: {Private.}The most important transport in the area is cars or motorbikes.At school,approx 45% have 2 cars or a car and a motorbike ,40% have 1 car,15% don't have a car.People without cars have to rely on public transport. {Public.}13 buses go to Cremyll on Summer week-days.First at 06.36 last at 17.56.From Cremyll 9 buses stop at Millbrook.First at 8.15 last at 8.21. In Summer only 3 buses go to and from Cremyll, no buses on Sunday in the Winter.The fare from Cremyll to Millbrook is 50p.To Plymouth there are 7 buses each way.In Summer only, there are 3 buses on Sunday.These are for the convenience of Plymouth tourists coming to the local beaches.So the bus route is diverted via the beaches at Whitsands in Summer. {Coaches.}Packhams Coaches- private school daily transport.Local hire.
